SEARCH
Package edu.cwru.csds293

Class AdjacencySetBuilder

java.lang.Object
edu.cwru.csds293.AdjacencySetBuilder
public final class AdjacencySetBuilder extends Object
Class: AdjacencySetBuilder A mutable builder for constructing and modifying adjacency-setâ€“based graph representations. This class maintains an internal mapping from each vertex to the set of incident edges, supporting adding/removing vertices, adding edges, removing edges, and contracting edges. Once the desired structure is created, it can be converted into an immutable AdjacencySets instance with AdjacencySetStatus.

This builder guarantees that all adjacency information is kept consistent across operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AdjacencySetBuilder()
    Constructs an empty builder with no vertices and no edges.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdjacencySetBuilder

      public AdjacencySetBuilder()
      Constructs an empty builder with no vertices and no edges.

  • Method Details

    • edges

      public Set<Edge> edges(Vertex u)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of all edges currently incident on the given vertex. If the vertex is not present in the builder, an empty set is returned.
      Parameters:
      u - the vertex whose adjacency set is requested
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable set of edges incident on u
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if u is null

    • incidentEdges

      public Set<Edge> incidentEdges(Edge edge)
      Returns all edges incident on either endpoint of the given edge, excluding the given edge.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge whose adjacent edges are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a set of edges incident on the endpoints of edge, except for edge itself
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if edge is null

    • add

      public AdjacencySetBuilder add(Vertex u)
      Adds the specified vertex to the builder if it does not already exist. The vertex is initialized with an empty adjacency set. If the vertex is already present, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      u - the vertex to add
      Returns:
      this builder instance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if u is null

    • add

      public AdjacencySetBuilder add(Edge edge)
      Adds the given edge to the adjacency sets of both its endpoints. New vertices are automatically created if the endpoints are not yet present in the builder.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge to add
      Returns:
      this builder instance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if edge is null

    • remove

      public AdjacencySetBuilder remove(Edge edge)
      Removes an edge from both of its endpoints' adjacency sets. If the edge is not present at one or both endpoints, nothing happens to the builder.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge to remove
      Returns:
      this builder instance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if edge is null

    • removeVertex

      public void removeVertex(Vertex u)
      Removes the given vertex and all edges incident on it. All neighboring vertices are updated to remove their references to that vertex's incident edges. The method is removed from the builder if it exists.
      Parameters:
      u - the vertex to remove
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if u is null

    • remove

      public AdjacencySetBuilder remove(Vertex u)
      Removes the specified vertex and all edges incident on it, returning this builder for chaining. Identical to removeVertex(Vertex).
      Parameters:
      u - the vertex to remove
      Returns:
      this builder instance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if u is null

    • remove

      public AdjacencySetBuilder remove(Set<Vertex> vertices)
      Removes all vertices in the given set and all incident edges.
      Parameters:
      vertices - the set of vertices to remove
      Returns:
      this builder instance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if vertices is null

    • build

      public Optional<AdjacencySets> build(AdjacencySetStatus status)
      Builds an immutable AdjacencySets instance using the current adjacency data and the given status. The status determines how the resulting structure is validated and interpreted.
      Parameters:
      status - the guaranteed status
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the constructed adjacency sets if successful, or empty if the structure is invalid
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if status is null

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Vertex vertex)
      Returns whether the given vertex is currently in the builder.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex to test
      Returns:
      true if the vertex exists, otherwise false
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if vertex is null

    • contract

      public AdjacencySetBuilder contract(Edge edge) throws EdgeException
      Contracts the specified edge by merging its two endpoints into a new combined vertex whose label is the concatenation of the original labels. Functionalities:
      1. Collects all incident edges except the given edge in the method.
      2. Removes both original vertices and their incident edges.
      3. Adds a new combined vertex.
      4. Adds back the edges from the two original vertices, now changed to be connected to the combined vertex.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge to contract
      Returns:
      this builder instance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if edge is null
      EdgeException - if edge creation fails during the changes
